education.summary:
• A 12-month intensive program covering the foundations and core practices of software engineering. 
• I gained hands-on experience in C programming, Bash scripting, Linux systems, computer architecture, binary interpretation, reverse engineering, Python, Flask, Django, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. 
• The program provided a deep understanding of how computers work from the ground up and how to build scalable software systems.

• After and during my ALX program, I took multiple Udemy courses to deepen my understanding of full-stack development. 
• These included certifications of completion for HTML & CSS, Advanced CSS, JavaScript, and The Ultimate React Course 2024: React, Next.js, Redux & More. 
• The React course covered Redux Toolkit, Styled Components, Tailwind CSS, API development, TypeScript, React Query, Firebase, Supabase, and authentication using context providers. 
• I also purchased a Node.js course to further strengthen my backend knowledge, though I already apply full-stack concepts using Next.js.

• Completed training on Android app development using Android Studio and Java. 
• The course covered UI/UX design, data persistence, and mobile software architecture. 
• Later, I complemented this knowledge by exploring Spring Boot for Java-based backend development.

work.summary:

HighEnd-Cars.name: HighEnd Cars
HighEnd-Cars.description:
• High-End Cars is a complete luxury car e-commerce platform built with Next.js. It features full car management, coupon control, user orders, chat system, and crypto payment (Coinbase Commerce) integration — all in one scalable, high-performance stack. 
 	 • TECH STACK: Typescript, NextJS, Redux ToolKit, Supabase, Socket.IO(Supabase Realtime), Axios, React Query, Styled Components, React Hot Toast, Lucide React, Framer Motion, React Slick.

Wild-Oasis-Customer-Facing-Website.name: Wild Oasis Customer Facing Website
Wild-Oasis-Customer-Facing-Website.description:
• The Wild Oasis is a customer-facing web application for a luxurious hotel. Guests can browse cabins, make reservations, manage bookings, and update profiles — all in a modern, secure, and responsive interface. 
 	 • TECH STACK: NextJs, NextJs API Routes, NextAuth, Typescript, TailwindCSS, Supabase, Heroicons, React Day Picker, Date-fns.

The-Wild-Oasis.name: The Wild Oasis
The-Wild-Oasis.description:
• The Wild Oasis is an internal hotel management app to manage everything about the hotel: bookings, cabins, and guests, as well as to check in guests when they arrive. 
 	• TECH STACK: React, Supabase, React Router, React Query, React Error Boundary, React Hook Form, React Hot Toast, React Icons, Recharts, Styled Components, Date-fns.
